simplified: 听君一席话，胜读十年书

pronunciation.pinyin: tīng jūn yī xí huà , shèng dú shí nián shū
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: ting1 jun1 yi1 xi2 hua4 , sheng4 du2 shi2 nian2 shu1

details.simplified: 听君一席话，胜读十年书
details.traditional: 聽君一席話，勝讀十年書

meanings.value: listening to the words of a wise man can be superior to studying ten years of books (proverb)
